Pre-Game Insights: Current champion Argentina will defend their title against Colombia in the 2024 Copa America final on Sunday, July 14 at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida.
The heated semifinal between Colombia and Uruguay ended in a 1-0 victory for Colombia, with Jefferson Lerma scoring in the 39th minute.
For Argentina’s advancement, Julián Álvarez scored in the first half of the semifinal against Canada. Lionel Messi secured their spot with his first goal in the tournament, ending in a 2-0 victory.
While Colombia only has one Copa America win from 2001, Argentina is looking to become the tournament’s historic champion with a record-breaking 16 wins.
